评论概述: Yes, there is good men’s fashion on Amazon.
评论详情: I bought one of these, hesitatingly. The pictures make it look rather cheesy, but with Amazon Prime, a guy can toss the dice, return it if it bites. This defo does not bite. I bought another color, in fact.  It looks more spendy than it is, rather like Madewell, the fit is true to size and roomy, the fabric is a good-looking lighter weight, comfortable and incredibly verstaile in a wardrobe. It’s one of my favorite additions this spring.  Never heard of this brand, like so many on Amazon in clothing, but I am very happy with my jackets. So one knows, they run longer than a trucker jacket, which I liked.  Handsome jackets about which I’ve been asked many times.

评论概述: Heavy canvas. Nice lightweight jacket
评论详情: This is a nice casual shirt/jacket.  It is definitely more jacket than shirt because of the thickness of the canvas material.  This will absolutely protect you from the elements.  Pair this with a sweater underneath, or a thick shirt, and you will have the needed insulation for most weather.I tend to wear this in the workshop or doing yardwork.  It is taking a beating, and it still looks great.

评论概述: I bought this as a gift for my cousin
评论详情: I bought it for my cousin and I hope it fits him well.

评论概述: Runs small; sleeves tight; bizarre care instructions
评论详情: This shirt runs a full size small, as with most clothing made in China. I ordered a full size up and got a good fit.I got the shirt for working outside and in the garage during cool weather, wearing just a t-shirt underneath.  It fits well in this scenario.  I found the sleeves a bit tighter than expected. Not uncomfortably so, but not as loose as the rest of the shirt. The shirt is a nice, heavy cotton that seems very substantial.Finally, the care instructions can best be described as "bizarre."  You are supposed to handwash it and dry it flat--no dryer.  OK, that's fine for woman's delicate nightgown.  But a work shirt??? Seriously???  I washed it in the delicate cycle on cool and dried it on low.  It came out fine, though a bit wrinkled (which is to be expected of this kind of cotton).  I've only worn and washed it once, so we'll see how it hold up over the long run, but I refuse to hadwash and dry a work shirt flat!

评论概述: Heavy duty work shirt or light jacket
评论详情: Excellent weighted shirt for cooler weather or light jacket.  Heavy duty material but quite comfortable, perfect for the cool morning wear you need something light yet breathable as the day warms up.

评论概述: Heavyweight shacket (jackirt?)
评论详情: This is a (slightly) military-style shirt/jacket.  More a jacket though; I can’t imagine tucking this in.  Quite heavy denim-ish cotton.  Only a breast pocket on the outside, but has a couple of (lined) capacious pockets inside.  Basic boxy styling, no muscle shirt this.Says to handwash and dry flat.  For cotton?  Really?  It’s not a Merino wool sweater for goodness sake, so  I’m not gonna do that.  My concession to careful washing will be cool gentle cycle.  We’ll see how that works over time.  I like it so recommended.
